This polo sweater  has a deep rich color, it's soft and true to size. I got it for my teenage son, whom even wore it to his 1st date when taking a young lady out to dinner and the movies. He says that he loves how the sweater clings to his arms and shows off his muscles. He was able to wear the sweater throughout his evening without getting overheated.

This is a long-sleeve polo that you can dress up or down right off the hook without having to iron. Because it's not a sweater that you have to wear a shirt under -- or even a t-shirt -- it's not too hot. The material is super soft and feels good against my skin. I got black, which looks really sharp for an evening out. I will wear this often and probably take it when I travel.

I would wear this to do work around the house and as a pajama top.  I would not go out on a date, or any place that matters wearing this.  This is a casual long sleeve shirt that is thin, made to wear with a pair of jeans for casual stuff.  I would wear it to the grocery store, and to do some errands.  It is true to size, the fabric is lightweight, so you can use this as a layer with a flannel shirt.  It is comfortable, and easy to care for.
Bought for my son who loves it. Can be casual or dressy. Comfortable and warm.

The men's sweater is as the seller describes, pictures, and size chart is true to fit. The fabric is soft and comfortable without losing it's shape over the day wearing even with pushing the sleeves up. The color is soft yet dark or bold enough to give the look you see in the seller's pictures. Washing on delicate and air dry has worked great. The style allows for casual to business attire depending on how its paired, and gives a sharp look. Recommend for any guy or as a gift.

Great choice for those looking for a comfortable option for both casual and dressy occasions. Pairs well with jeans or dress pants.  It fits true to size, and the quality of the fabric feels soft and breathable. The only slight drawback is that it may wrinkle a bit after washing, but nothing that a quick iron can't fix. Overall, it's a great addition to any wardrobe for those looking for an easy yet polished look!
Soft and a great color of blue. My hubby looks fantastic in it. The size is true to what they're size chart says. Lightweight so perfect for Spring & Fall. I got my money's worth
This shirt is really comfortable to wear. It is thick, but soft.
I'm usually skeptical of buying shirts online. To my surprise I was very pleased when I received my shirt. It was of very excellent quality. Good going coofandy

评论概述: The  Most important thing was the right size and fit
评论详情: I loved the way it fitted my grandson and the weight of the material.

This Coofandy men's sweater is a stylish and versatile addition to any mens wardrobe. The lightweight knit fabric offers a comfortable, breathable fit that's good for layering under a jacket or over a t-shirt, and of course on its own. The long sleeves and classic polo design provide a polished yet casual look, making it suitable for both dressy and relaxed occasions. It looks equally good dressed up with pants or down with some jeans. I ordered a medium and the fit and size is accurate, with a flattering silhouette that maintains its shape well. Overall, it's a nicely made sweater that balances comfort and smart design. I recommend this sweater.

评论概述: My hubby looks SEXY in this well made, stylish sweater!!
评论详情: This men’s 100 percent polyester knitted polo type sweater from Coofandy checks all of the boxes! My hubby looks fantastic in this sweater and we plan to buy a couple more color options for the Fall season!  The material is soft, medium weight and has the perfect amount of stretch. Featuring a slimmer fit, polo style collar with 3 buttons, elastic ribbed cuffs at the wrists and at the waistline really help accentuate your body while remaining comfortable and warm enough for cooler weather.  We found this to be true to size and a very flattering fit. Care instructions say machine wash cool and lay flat to dry. The light grey color we ordered looks just like the listing photos. They also offer many other color options and as I said we will be ordering a couple more! This sweater looks and feels flawless! I can’t wait for cooler weather so I can see him in this more often!  If you are looking for a well made, stylish sweater than can be dressed up or down AND at an affordable price, you can’t go wrong with this Coofandy knitted men’s sweater! Great price for the quality in my opinion! 5 stars!
Warm and soft! Buy it!

It's also a little tighter in the belly than I would like.  For bigger fellas I would suggest avoiding this sweater but if you're on the slender side, I don't see you having any issues with it!
Really nice sweater, well made, durable comfortable material.

Great quality for the price.  Purchased for my son to wear at a funeral service.  He looked great, & was comfortable

评论概述: Pleasingly Soft Material – Taper at Waist Makes Nice Fit – Cuffs Keep Sleeves Where You Like ‘Em
评论详情: What a soft and delightful polo shirt. The Coofandy Mens Knit Polo is well made. I bought a Large to accommodate my 34.5 dress shirt sized arms. It’s a bit big in the chest for me, but still drapes well thanks to the slight taper at the waist. The sleeves are finished with cuffs that will keep the sleeves where you want them whether all the way down or up when you need them out of the way for chores or cooling off.  It is an easy-care shirt. The original travel wrinkles disappeared after a machine wash and very gentle run in the dryer. The care tag says not to tumble dry.  The so-called lightweight fabric warms me up right away. It is more medium weight, in my opinion. I’ll be enjoying this good looking and very comfortable shirt in the Fall, Winter and Spring. The picture shows a large on my 5’11”, 40”, 150-pound frame.
Sizing is accurate and there fabric feels great. Very comfortable.

This shirt looks great. The green is a very rich, nice looking color. The shirt fits as expected for the size. It is very soft and comfortable to wear.  The listing says it is a "sweater," but it is really just a long sleeve pullover polo shirt. The thickness is not what you would expect for a sweater, but is more in line with a regular shirt. Nothing wrong with that--that is exactly what I wanted!

评论概述: COOFANDY Strikes Again: The Knit Polo Sweater Every Guy Needs
评论详情: Okay, I'll admit it. If it says COOFANDY, I'm probably buying it. Their clothes consistently hit the mark for style, comfort, and value. This Mens Knit Polo Sweater is no exception.  First of all, the demin blue color is fantastic – rich and versatile. It's the perfect shade to dress up or down. The knit fabric is soft and lightweight, making it ideal for transitioning between seasons. I love the long sleeves and the classic polo collar; it's a timeless look that's both casual and polished.  The fit is spot on. I ordered a medium, and it's true to size. It's not too tight, not too loose – just the right amount of room to move comfortably. I've worn this sweater with jeans, chinos, and even dress pants, and it looks great with everything.  Honestly, I can't find a single fault with this sweater. It's well-made, stylish, and incredibly comfortable. If you're looking for a versatile piece to add to your wardrobe, look no further. COOFANDY has done it again!

评论概述: nice looking for a budget price, lightweight for a sweater
评论详情: This sweater is made from polyester and has some amount of loose seams on the interior, but it is not uncomfortable to wear over a T-shirt. I like the simple, but classy woven-in stripes. Fit is relaxed around the chest, but because of the elastic waist, this sweater probably fits thinner people better.

I've become a fan of the Coofandy brand over the last year and this shirt just solidifies that. Very stylish, fits me well, and very comfortable. I got an XL, which is the size I typically wear, and this fit about as expected (for reference: I'm 5'9", 220lbs). Prob best for cooler weather, but its thin enough that you can probably get away with wearing it in the summer too (as long as you have some A/C nearby). Very happy with this shirt.

The sweater is very comfortable and fits perfectly. The color is just right. The fabric feel is very soft on the skin. This sweater has long sleeves. Really a wonderful sweater. This would make a great gift for that man on your list. Size was true to fit. Would purchase again.
My hubs is hard to please - but he loves this sweater. It is thicker than I thought, but the color is beautiful and it will be perfect for the winter. It is true to size.
Really great quality shirt. Thick fabric. Fits as expected
